paper_title: Sharp pointwise convergence on the Schrödinger operator along one class of curves
abstract: Almost everywhere convergence on the solution of Schrödinger equation is an important problem raised by Carleson, which was essentially solved by Du-Guth-Li and Du-Zhang. In this note, we obtain the sharp pointwise convergence on the Schrödinger operator along one class of curves.
publication_venue: 15 pages, To appear in Bulletin des sciences mathématiques
